articles.description: Ravichandran Ashwin recalled MS Dhoni's quote after the Indian team suffered a 2-3 defeat in the T20I series against West Indies.
articles.content: The Indian cricket team had a mixed outing on the tour of West Indies. Though they won the Test and ODI series, while giving opportunities to plenty of youngsters, the T20I series resulted in a bitte… [+2058 chars]

articles.title: [Watch] Rinku Singh Expresses His Emotions in a 'Wholesome' Interview With Jitesh Sharma Ahead Of IRE vs IND - OneCricket
articles.description: During IPL 2023, everything Rinku Singh touched turned to gold. Will it stay the same when he will potentially make his India debut on Friday (August 18) in the first of the three-match T20I series in Ireland?
articles.content:
